record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="SystemEvents" and term="System events table" and format.name="SystemEvents" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: SystemEvents - System events table - SystemEvents - en
record.file.name: SystemEvents
record.format.name: SystemEvents

brief.brief: Contains all the events that invoke a RAD application.

Records the Event Name and RAD Application name. When the system receives an event, the corresponding RAD application invokes a new RAD thread. The events used to invoke a RTE function register themselves upon start-up of the client.
If you edit a system event record, you must re-login before the system recognizes the changes.
Note: You can have multiple records for one event; each application invokes separate RAD thread.
